snippet: Ronnie O’Sullivan beat his fellow Briton Ali Carter, 18-11, to win the snooker world championship in Sheffield, England, for the fourth time.
abstract: Ronnie O’Sullivan defeats fellow Briton Ali Carter, 18-11, to win the snooker world championship title for the fourth time.
lead_paragraph: Ronnie O’Sullivan beat his fellow Briton Ali Carter, 18-11, to win the snooker world championship in Sheffield, England, for the fourth time.

headline.main: O’Sullivan Takes Fourth Snooker World Title
